_sText:
**THE ORIGINAL MAP WAS MADE BY TOAST.**
I only recreated it from scratch.
I just wanted to improve some things from the original, since it was a great map in my opinion.
Smooth ramps, so it's easier to stay on.
No leaks, therefore not needing the 15000x15000 skybox around the entire map.
1.98 Mb to be exact.
No light, to keep the original feel.

Love it or hate it.
